about_the_game:
Can you guide the Jonalds to their prize?


Jonald had never even heard of gaming before when they received a message from their future self through a dream. A gaming revolution was about to begin and they needed 250 USD TONIGHT if they were going to be a part of it. Starting from nothing but some lint under the couch, you must create more Jonalds and guide them to gaming glory in this idle automation experience.

Features

  • Build and customize schedules for Jonalds to follow! Have them scavenge for lint and wires, or mine for soda, or maybe watch TV to increase their efficiency.

  • Balance a dozen different resources to optimize and expand your capabilities. Unlock new actions and systems. Drink soda to increase their speed. Build bedding to increase their resting. A proper balance of soda and sleep is best for Jonald.

  • A short idle game that can be beaten in an afternoon or two. Expect to be able to buy upgrades and make choices every 15 minutes or so, no waiting hours or days.

  • Every character is trans! Every Jonald is a tiny horse!

  • Featuring an original soundtrack by Vince Alan!
